page.title: 12TIBBERTON JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: The new school was opened in 1970 and serves Sambrook and Tibberton. The children start aged 5 and leave at 11. It teaches basic skills including Maths, English, Geography, Art and Music. Sport plays a large part, rounders, football and netball.They also swim in the summer. There is an{11+ system}which decides which secondary school a pupil wil attend. The pupils are taught on a mixed ability basis. All pupils wear school uniform. Corporal punishment is not administered. School dinners and school bus are provided. The bus is free for certain ages living over 2 miles away. There are 38 boys, 32 girls and 4 teachers. There is a{P.T.A.}which helps to raise funds for the school. At the annual open day, parents can see how their children are progressing.
